title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Taoiseach) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (taoiseach) (no 2) order 2023

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 2. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Taoiseach with effect from 17 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 patrick cluskey particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser taoiseach effect 17 december 2022

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 3. Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Taoiseach with effect from 17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

16 May, 2023. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [266] 3
